title: Old Judge HOFers, Buchner for sale
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: Old Judge HOFers, Buchner for sale
posts.post_content:
Here are two OJ HOFers for sale - Please PM me or email at [url]crb_972@yahoo.com[/url] for questions or to confirm purchase:

Buchner Pete Wood - unique card - only horizontal in the set - $100

Pud Galvin - Trimmed on sides and back skinned but a very strong image. Tougher HOFer. - sold

Thompson - good image; solid vg front, wear to back - back is thin - will likely grade an A - Sold

McCarthy - vg front - back is clean except for faint writing - sold

Thanks

Chris
I'll take the Thompson, the image for this pose is a slight upgrade for me.

I will take mcCarthy if still available. 
Thanks 
Jonathan
